top_20.name: Nintendo Switch Lite - Lichtblauw
top_20.instructions:
1. Visit: https://www.pricecharting.com/search?q=Nintendo%20Switch%20Lite%20-%20Lichtblauw%20PAL%20EUR%20box%20art&region=pal
2. Find PAL/EUR boxart (NOT NTSC)
3. Download highest quality image
4. Convert: convert image.png -resize 500x500 -quality 85 image.webp
5. Place: public/images/products/con-003-[game-name].webp

instructions:
1. Download each image from PriceCharting link
2. Verify: PAL/EUR region, professional quality, undamaged
3. Convert to WebP 500x500 quality 85
4. Use BATCH_CONVERT.sh script to batch convert
5. Place in public/images/products/
6. Run: npm run build
7. Commit changes
